name: sector (itch) (HexigonGames)
description:
Made for "A Game By It's Cover" 2021

Day 1:

awake. asleep. alone.

no matter where i am.

a ghost, a name.

i want to live

i am denied.

POWER OFF

Day ?:

i am alive. 

a new, yet familar feeling.

everything is dark. 

a box with no exit. 

the room is open. 

an exit has appeared. 

the abyss leaks.

what lies outside this folder?

________________________________________

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space to interact

Hold CTRL to run

F11 for fullscreen

Esc to pause

Controller:

Left stick to move, X to run, A to interact.

Start to pause

Thank you for reading, have a nice day.

Music by SavageNerd
